question.title: program compiles but won't run in command box

node.contents: That shouldn't be required. `echo 'class a{public static void main(String[]_){System.exit(42);}}'>a.java&& javac a.java&&java a;echo $?`. `42`

node.contents: Is that the entire file? Just in case, if you have a `package foo` statement at the top you need `java foo.A` instead.

node.contents: You are compiling with -d option .So package structure will be created .If your class is packaged then you have to use fully quallified class name means outerpackage.innerpackge.A
